name: quick-highlight

highlightSelectionMinimumLength.description: Minimum length of selection to be highlight

highlightSelectionDelay.description: Delay(ms) before start to highlight selection when selection changed

countDisplayPriority.description: Lower priority get closer position to the edges of the window

countDisplayStyles.description: Style class for count span element. See `styleguide:show`.

scripts.watch: fswatch -0 spec lib | xargs -0 -n1 -I{} apm test
